ID, BWPP_FROM_ID, BWPP_TO_ID, BWPP_ENTRY_TIME,
#{ID}, #{BWPP_FROM_ID}, #{BWPP_TO_ID}, #{BWPP_ENTRY_TIME},
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BUS_WECHAT_PRAISE_POINT WHERE BWPP_FROM_ID = #{BWPP_FROM_ID} AND BWPP_TO_ID = #{BWPP_TO_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT CAST(@RANK := @RANK +1 AS SIGNED) AS WECHAT_RANK,BW.*,IMG.BWR_LIGHT_ICON FROM (SELECT @RANK := 0) r, (SELECT BW.ID, BW.BW_USERNAME,BW.BW_AVATAR, EAD.BAD_ENTERTIME, IFNULL(BWD.CLOCKIN_COUNT,0) CLOCKIN_COUNT, IFNULL(BWP.BWP_NUMBER,0) BWP_NUMBER FROM BUS_WECHAT BW LEFT JOIN (SELECT BAD.BW_ID,COUNT(DISTINCT BAD.BW_ID) CLOCKIN_COUNT FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL BAD INNER JOIN BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA ON BA.ID = BAD.BA_ID AND BA.IS_STATUS = 1 GROUP BY BAD.BW_ID )BWD ON BWD.BW_ID = BW.ID LEFT JOIN BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL EAD ON EAD.BW_ID = BW.ID AND EAD.ID = (SELECT MIN(EAD.ID) FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL EAD WHERE EAD.BW_ID = BW.ID GROUP BY EAD.BW_ID) AND EAD.BA_ID IN(SELECT BA.ID FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA WHERE BA.IS_STATUS = 1 ) LEFT JOIN BUS_WECHAT_PRAISE BWP ON BWP.BW_ID = BW.ID ORDER BY BWD.CLOCKIN_COUNT DESC,IFNULL(BWP.BWP_NUMBER,0) DESC,EAD.BAD_ENTERTIME ASC )BW LEFT JOIN( SELECT ID,GROUP_CONCAT(BWR_LIGHT_ICON ORDER BY BA_ENTRYTIME ASC,BA_ID ASC) BWR_LIGHT_ICON FROM( SELECT BW.ID,BA.ID BA_ID,BA.BA_ENTRYTIME, (CASE WHEN BAD.BA_ID IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(SFA.SF_PATH,'@@@',SFA.SF_NAME) ELSE CONCAT(SFA.SF_PATH,'@@@',SFA.SF_NAME,'@@@0') END) BWR_LIGHT_ICON FROM BUS_WECHAT BW INNER JOIN BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA ON BA.IS_STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT BW.ID,BAD.BA_ID FROM BUS_WECHAT BW INNER JOIN BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL BAD ON BAD.BW_ID = BW.ID GROUP BY BW.ID,BAD.BA_ID)BAD ON BA.ID = BAD.BA_ID AND BW.ID = BAD.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE SFA ON SFA.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SFA.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND SFA.SF_SDI_CODE = 2 )IMG GROUP BY ID )IMG ON IMG.ID = BW.ID )TEMP
